Class IteratorUtil

extends Object
    Utility methods for Iterators.

    • Method Detail

      • any

        public static <T> boolean any​(Iterator<T> iterator,
                              Predicate<? super T> predicate)
        Checks whether any element provided by the given iterator satisfies the given predicate. Note that the iterator is consumed in this process.
        Type Parameters:
        T - element type
        Parameters:
        iterator - the iterator to provide the elements
        predicate - the predicate to test
        Returns:
        true if at least one element satisfies the predicate, false otherwise

      • batch

        public static <T> Iterator<List<T>> batch​(Iterator<T> iterator,
                                          int batchSize)
        Returns an iterator that aggregates elements of a given source iterator in batches of a given size. While elements are collected eagerly within a batch, the overall batches are computed lazily. The source iterator is consumed in this process.

        Note that subsequent calls to the returned iterator's Iterator.next() method return a reference to the same batch object, and only update its contents. If you plan to reuse intermediate results, you'll need to explicitly copy them.

        If the batch size is not a divisor of the number of elements that the iterator provides, the last constructed batch may not be filled completely.

        Type Parameters:
        T - element type
        Parameters:
        iterator - the iterator to read the original elements from
        batchSize - the size of batches that should be constructed
        Returns:
        an iterator that provides the original elements in batches of the given size

      • concat

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> Iterator<T> concat​(Iterator<? extends T>... iterators)
        Returns an iterator that iterates over all elements of the given source iterators.
        Type Parameters:
        T - element type
        Parameters:
        iterators - the source iterators
        Returns:
        the concatenated iterator

        Type Parameters:
